Topic.Title: Why Is Big Government, Big Deficit, Socialism So Popular In America

Message.Msg: Perhaps what many voters have witnessed and are reacting to during the last 20 years or so, is the immoral explotation of the working class by greeding corrupt business and political leaders, the damaging forever of much of the environment (big oil, mining, uncaring development), silly, religious-based "values" and other, to quote Jindal, "stupid" acts from the right-wing .
